_header: All that love to hear this lesson / Christ grant them his benison
Note: With a cross-rhymed quatrain as colophon.
_description: ‘A Good Lesson of IX Vertewis’ (with a short preface) — 210 lines in couplets

CULDd11.First Lines:
Alle þat loue to here þis lessounCrist graunt hem his
                    benisoun…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…to which ioye & to which blisGod bring vs alle whan his
                    wil is AmenÞese ix vertewis wiþ good cheuysaunceEueri man
                    may wel fulfilWiþout gret cost or gret penaunceif þat he
                    haue þer to good wil
CULDd11.Attributed Title: A good lesson of ix vertewis (298v)
CULDd11.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “A Middle English Poem on the Nine Virtues.” 
             Southern Folklore Quarterly
         31 (1967): 37-47: 41-7.
